short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add install commands to the NinjaRMM interface when generating installers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add install commands to the NinjaRMM interface. When you generate an installer, there will be a command panel in addition to the copy and download buttons that appear. When the command area is clicked, the commands will copy to your clipboard. This works for Mac and PC installers.
